REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0184 reute r f BC-SWEDISH-CURRENT-ACCOU 03-31 0054

TEXT.TITLE: SWEDISH CURRENT ACCOUNT DEFICIT RISES IN JANUARY
TEXT.BODY: Sweden's balance of payments on current account showed a deficit of 500 mln crowns in January after a shortfall of 100 mln in December, Central Bank figures showed. This compared with a deficit of 1.3 billion in January 1986, the Bank said. REUTER
